abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Heights Chateau, Brooklyn Heights wine shop noted for its staff's expertise.
lead_paragraph: When it opened in 1986, its stretch of Atlantic Avenue in Brooklyn Heights was known for dive bars, but the wine shop slowly built a relationship with local residents.

headline.main: At Heights Chateau, a Welcoming Home for Wine Lovers
headline.print_headline: A Welcoming Home for Wine Lovers

snippet: When it opened in 1986, its stretch of Atlantic Avenue in Brooklyn Heights was known for dive bars, but the wine shop slowly built a relationship with local residents.
